snippet.title: Puzzle Chasers
snippet.description:
Check out the gameplay trailer for the newest Facebook game, Puzzle Chasers.  

A puzzle game filled with adventure, mystery and romance! Someone is stealing the world's greatest landmarks and it's up to you to put the pieces together to save them!

Puzzle Chasers is available 6/19/2012 on Facebook.

Please visit:
http://konami.com
http://www.facebook.com/ThePuzzleChasers
http://www.twitter.com/konami
http://konami.tumblr.com
